question:
You have been asked to perform light post-editing on the following segment:

Source - Hola, se me olvidó mi contraseña me la pueden reenviar por favor.

Raw MT - Hello, my password is forgotten to me for please.

Identify the segment that has been post-edited correctly, according to TAUS guidelines.
